default_unlock_schedule.description: By default, unlocking starts at WhiteWhale launch, with a cliff of 12 months and a duration of 12 months. If not specified, all allocations use this default schedule

owner.description: Account which can create new allocations

refund_recepient.description: Account which will receive refunds upon allocation terminations

cliff.description: Number of seconds starting UST during which no token will be vested/unlocked

duration.description: Number of seconds taken by tokens to be fully vested

start_time.description: Timestamp of when vesting is to be started
